skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Crafting captivating front-end experiences, I blend creativity with code to bring websites and apps to life. Let's collaborate and create something extraordinary together!

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Diving headfirst into back-end coding, I'm eager to learn and build the magic behind the incredible apps you love. Let's team up and make tech dreams happen!

skills.title: Audiovisual Media
skills.description: Crafting captivating visual stories with our unique photography and videography style. From portraits to events and product images, let's create memorable moments.

skills.title: Tutoring
skills.description: Unlock your academic potential with personalized tutoring in Spanish and Coding. Our comprehensive services cater to beginners, guiding you to success.

portfolio.title: Card Game
portfolio.description: This project aimed to teach students essential Python concepts like classes, constructors, attributes, methods, and inheritance. Through hands-on exercises, students practiced creating classes, distinguishing between attributes, and mastering inheritance.

portfolio.title: The Game of Hog
portfolio.description: Our inaugural project, The Game of Hog in the CIS 61 class, pushed us to apply higher-order functions creatively, fostering critical thinking and innovative strategy development to outperform baseline standards.

portfolio.title: Open Energy Dashboard
portfolio.description: Implemented critical JavaScript test case ('B7') using Chai and Mocha in Open Energy Dashboard open source project. PR #1079 seamlessly accepted, demonstrating commitment to collaborative development in renewable energy.
